original_text: And I will make your tongue cling to the roof of your mouth, so that you shall be mute and unable to reprove them, for they are a rebellious house.
korean_text: 내가 네 혀를 네 입천장에 붙게 하여 네가 말 못하는 자가 되어 그들을 꾸짖는 자가 되지 못하게 하리니 그들은 패역한 족속임이니라

sentences.original_text: And I will make your tongue cling to the roof of your mouth
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 네 혀를 입천장에 달라붙게 하여

sentences.original_text: so that you shall be mute
for they are a rebellious house
